info.title: Language Platform - API
info.description: Language Platform API provides the resources to manage & access dictionaries of multiple languages, and to use tools provided by the platform

tags.name: Word
tags.description: APIs for CRUD and search of word objects and to flag word object

tags.name: Synset
tags.description: APIs for CRUD of synset objects

tags.name: Varna
tags.description: APIs for CRUD of varna objects

tags.name: WordList
tags.description: APIs for CRUD of wordlist objects

tags.name: Traversal Rule
tags.description: APIs for CRUD of Traversal Rule objects

get.summary: Gets all words in the specified language
get.description: This endpoint returns all the words available in the specified language. Each word object in the response contains the word metadata and details of all its meanings.

parameters.name: language_id
parameters.description: Unique code of the language for which all words are returned

400.description: Error While fetching all words! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error While fetching all words! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

post.summary: Creates a Word in the specified language
post.description: This endpoint creates a word using the data in the request body

parameters.name: language_id
parameters.description: Unique code of the language in which the word should be created

400.description: Error While creating Word! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error While Creating Word! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

get.summary: Gets the word object for the given word identifier in the specified language
get.description: This endpoint returns a word object from the EkStep language platform.

parameters.name: language_id
parameters.description: Unique code of the language in which the word is searched for

parameters.name: wordId
parameters.description: Identifier of the word to be fetched

200.description: Word object found and returned successfully

400.description: Error While fetching word for the specified word identifier! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

404.description: Error While fetching word for the specified word identifier! | Error occurred when word is not found in the specified language, In general it is 'Resource Not Found Exception'

500.description: Error While fetching word for the specified word identifier! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

patch.summary: Updates a Word in the specified language
patch.description: This endpoint updates a word using the data in the request body

parameters.name: language_id
parameters.description: Unique code of the language in which the word exists

parameters.name: wordId
parameters.description: Identifier of the word to be updated

400.description: Error While updating Word! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

404.description: Error While fetching word for the specified word identifier! | Error occurred when word is not found in the specified language, In general it is 'Resource Not Found Exception'

500.description: Error While updating Word! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

post.summary: flags a Word in the specified language
post.description: This endpoint returns a word object from the EkStep language platform.

parameters.name: language_id
parameters.description: Unique code of the language in which the word is searched for

parameters.name: wordId
parameters.description: Identifier of the word to be fetched

400.description: Error While flagging Word! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

404.description: Error While fetching word for the specified word identifier! | Error occurred when word is not found in the specified language, In general it is 'Resource Not Found Exception'

500.description: Error While flagging Word! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

post.summary: Searches for Words in the specified language
post.description: This endpoint searches a word in the specified language using the search criteria provided in the request body

400.description: Error While searching Words! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error While searching Words! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

post.summary: Computes complexity measures for given list of words
post.description: This endpoint takes a list of words as input and computes the orthographic and phonological complexity of those words.

400.description: Error While computing complexity measures! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error While computing complexity measures! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

post.description: This endpoint performs analysis of the input text in specified language id and returns the following information: counts of words and syllables, total and average complexities, and complexity measures of each word in the text

400.description: Error during text analysis! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error during text analysis! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

post.description: This endpoint parses a given text and returns available information in EkStep language platform about that word

400.description: Error during text parsing! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error during text parsing! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

post.description: This endpoint takes a lemma  with its language_id  and other languages as input and finds translation of it to other specified languages

parameters.name: language_id
parameters.description: Unique code of the language for which lemma is given for translation

parameters.name: lemma
parameters.description: lemma text of the given language which needs translation for other languages

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: list of languages for which translation required

200.description: Successfully transliterated into the specified language

400.description: Error during transliteration! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error during transliteration! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

post.description: This endpoint takes an english text as input and transliterates it into the specified language

parameters.name: language_id
parameters.description: Unique code of the language into which the given english text should be transliterated

parameters.name: addClosingVirama
parameters.description: Parameter to specify if the transliterated word should end with a virama if there is no ending vowel

200.description: Successfully transliterated into the specified language

400.description: Error during transliteration! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error during transliteration! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

patch.description: This endpoint updates a synset using the data in the request body

parameters.name: synsetId
parameters.description: Identifier of the synset to be updated

get.summary: Gets all traversal rules in the specified language
get.description: This endpoint returns all the traversal rules available in the specified language. Each traversal rule object in the response contains information regading traversal.

parameters.name: language_id
parameters.description: Unique code of the language for which all wordlists are returned

400.description: Error While fetching all Traversal Rules! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error While fetching all Traversal Rules! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

post.summary: Creates a traversal rule in the specified language
post.description: This endpoint creates a traversal rule using the data in the request body

parameters.name: language_id
parameters.description: Unique code of the language in which the traversal rule should be created

400.description: Error While creating Traversal Rule! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

500.description: Error While Creating Traversal Rule! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

parameters.description: Unique code of the language in which the Traversal Rule is searched for

parameters.name: traversalRuleId
parameters.description: Identifier of the traversal rule to be fetched

200.description: Traversal Rule object found and returned successfully

400.description: Error While fetching Traversal Rule for the specified traversal rule identifier! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of the input given by client, In general it is 'Client Exception'

404.description: Error While fetching Traversal Rule for the specified traversal rule identifier! | Error occurred when traversal rule is not found in the specified language, In general it is 'Resource Not Found Exception'

500.description: Error While fetching Traversal Rule for the specified traversal rule identifier! | Error occurred while operation, mostly because of erroneous condition on server, In general it is 'Server Exception' or 'Exception'

parameters.name: traversalRuleId
parameters.description: Identifier of the traversal rule to be updated

flagReasons.description: List of user given reasons for flagging

filters.description: Additional filters to apply based on the attributes of the objects

language_id.description: confines the search to the specified languages

objectType.description: type of objects to be searched for, specifying 'Word' will return only words

lemma.description: if provided, confines the search to words with the specified list of lemmas

status.description: if provided, confines the search to the objects having the specified status values. else, the search is confined to Live objects

filterProperty.description: Search request can contain multiple filters. Each filter has a key, which is one of the properties of object and value can be an array (to do an IN search) or a single value (to do an exact match search) or to check ranges using min/max parameters

exists.description: Filter to match objects which contains a given field

not_exists.description: Filter to match objects which does not contain a given field

limit.description: Maximum number of objects to be returned

sort_by.description: criteria to sort the results - a map of sort_key and sort_order values

sort_key.description: field on which the result should be sorted - should be one of the properties defined for the object type

sort_order.description: order in which results should be sorted - asc or desc

language_id.description: Unique code of the language of the input words

words.description: List of words whose complexity needs to be computed

language_id.description: Unique code of the language of the input text
Unique code of the language of the input text

equivalentWords.description: if equivalent words, for each word in the input text, should be returned or not

limit.description: Maximum number of equivalent words, per word in the input text, to be returned

text.description: English text that needs to be transliterated into the specified language

words.description: list of object matching the search criteria, grouped by object type

primaryMeaningId.description: Identifier of the primary meaning of the word

status.description: Status of the word: Draft, Live or Retired

otherMeanings.description: List of other meanings of the word

primaryMeaningId.description: Identifier of the primary meaning of the word

status.description: Status of the word: Draft, Live or Retired

pos.description: Parts of speech of the meaning

exampleSentences.description: Example sentences of the word in context of this meaning object

tools.description: List of words that are tools used on objects represented by the current meaning

objects.description: List of words that are objects of the tool represented by the current meaning

actions.description: List of words that are possible actions on words represented by the current meaning

workers.description: List of words that are workers of the action represented by the current meaning

complexity_measures.description: map of results with lemma of each input word as key and complexity measures as value

lemma.description: actual lemma of the input word

pos.description: parts of speech(pos) is category of words such as  noun, verb, adjective, adverb, pronoun, preposition, conjunction, interjection, etc

id.description: Unique identifier of the synset in graph database

relationType.description: Type of the relation between nodes

startNodeName.description: Node name of the start node

startNodeType.description: Node type of the start node

startNodeObjectType.description: Node Object Type of the start node

endNodeName.description: Node name of the end node

endNodeType.description: Node type of the end node

endNodeObjectType.description: Node Object Type of the end node

text_complexity.description: Object containing the analysis information of the input text

wordCount.description: number of words in the input text

syllableCount.description: number of syllables in the input text

meanOrthoComplexity.description: average orthographic complexity of the input text

totalOrthoComplexity.description: total orthographic complexity of the input text

meanPhonicComplexity.description: average phonological complexity of the input text

totalPhonicComplexity.description: total phonological complexity of the input text

wordMeasures.description: map with lemma of each word in the text as key and complexity measures as value

lemma.description: lemma of the word in the input text

parserObject.description: map of results for each word in the input text

lemma.description: lemma of the word in the input text

equivalentWords.description: list of words that are synonymous to the current word

output.description: transliteration of the input english text in the specified language

words.description: list of word that given wordlist contains
list of word that given wordlist contains

identifier.description: Unique identifier of the traversal rule

ruleScript.description: script name of the traversal rule

ruleObjectType.description: object type of the traversal rule

maxWords.description: maximum number of words that traversal rule can return
